title: Text Mining-Based Improvement Design for English E-Learning Courses

context.additional_context: Program for aspiring professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, requiring BYOD environments with enhanced real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can extract core concepts from English texts on scientific topics with 80% accuracy.
Learners can logically explain relationships between concepts within texts using the KeyGraph visualization tool.
Learners can report three or more opportunity elements (chances) identified during the learning process by applying Grounded Theory methodology.
Learners can diagnose their own learning motivation based on the ARCS model and propose improvement strategies.

resources: English academic text database in the sciences

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
